title: [20-Pack] PROCURU Decorator Paddle Rocker Light Switch, Single Pole, 3-Wire, Grounding 15A 120V-277V, White, UL Certified, Includes Wall Plate Covers

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #99,737 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #325 in Electrical Light Switches       #325 in Electrical Light Switches

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Impact and stain resistant, durable construction with polycarbonate thermoplastic and steel
Decorative paddle rocker style allows easy on/off control
Back insert and side wiring capable with ground screw

customers_say: Customers find the light switch to be a good quality product that works well and is easy to install. They appreciate its appearance, with one customer noting it matches Leviton switches, and consider it good value for money.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood product for a good price!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Just bought a home and had to change out all the old toggle switches. These were perfect. They look great. Operate how they should. Good quality product that would've cost double at a hardware store. Highly recommend if you have a bunch of old toggle switches you want to upgrade to an elegant, modern look.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Replaced all my current switches with these for a more sleek updated look. Price range for these are outstanding compared to big box home improvement stores. Some sound louder than others when turning on/off but they do the job and I saved a lot of money! They look great in comparison to the older flip switch and I am pleased with the quality, design and performance believe these will last for years to come.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBeautiful product, easy installation.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Great looking product, easy installation, nice home improvement piece.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat switch for this builder..
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Well we do tons and tons of work. We use over a 100 light switches per job.  I could pay $2.47 at Lowes or $1.33 here.  Same type switch.  Switches came fast and with a great price.  Never had a fail!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Ease of installation, Value for money, Quality good, Will buy again next time

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2025
